definitions.definition: Not in accord or harmony ; conflicting , incompatible .

subdefinitions.definition: Of people : disagreeing with each other; dissenting , quarrelsome .
Of sounds : harsh , jarring ; specifically ( music ) , of musical notes or tunes : not in harmony; dissonant , inharmonious .

definitions.definition: Of a rock formation or other land feature , or its alignment : cutting across or transverse to neighbouring features.
examples: Dikes may be discordant to country rock if they intrude at a high angle to the bedding.

subdefinitions.definition: Of a coastline : having bands of different types of rock running transversely to the coast , leading to the formation of alternating bays and headlands .

definitions.definition: Of two similar subjects , especially twins : differing in some characteristic .
Ellipsis of serodiscordant ( “ of a couple : with one partner HIV positive and the other HIV negative ” ) .
Of figures , etc.: having opposite signs (for example, positive and negative ).

main_definition: Not in accord or harmony ; conflicting , incompatible .
secondary_definitions: ( geology , physical geography , originally US ) Of a rock formation or other land feature , or its alignment : cutting across or transverse to neighbouring features.
( chiefly genetics ) Of two similar subjects , especially twins : differing in some characteristic .
( healthcare ) Ellipsis of serodiscordant ( “ of a couple : with one partner HIV positive and the other HIV negative ” ) .
( mathematics , statistics ) Of figures , etc.: having opposite signs (for example, positive and negative ).
